column4: Where can you Donwload the Biggest Solution in the Universe Episodes
I can't seem to Download from the Madcucks soundcloud, and I don't see them on the Dick Show TBPITU Uncucked page, are there uncucked versions of those episodes?
biggest.thedickshow.comNo uncuckeds for the solutions yet.
Good to know. I got into biggest problem during a few weeks before it ended, so i never got to check those out.
I can't actually find the files to download them
i tried to grab you a link from there, but no dice.  looks like you'll have to go torrent/maddox's soundcloud
You can't download then off of Maddox's sound cloud
yes you can...  [here](http://thebiggestproblemintheuniverse.com/bonus-episode-1/) then click the down arrow in the top right of the embedded player

no worries.  if you're doing a biggest problem listen, its worth spacing out the bonus episodes (the original release dates are listed iirc).  i, and a lot of other people, knew something was up when there was no season pass" for the second run of bonus eps"

as per smohqe's comment, [go here](http://biggest.thedickshow.com/episodes/) for the release/listening order. then make sure you save that as a playlist or something 'cause it'll take like weeks to get through it all.
